headline: Micron’s Singapore Fab Bet Tests AI NAND Growth And Rich Valuation
summary: Micron Technology has announced a $24b investment in a new advanced wafer fabrication facility in Singapore. The project is the company’s first double story fab and is focused on AI driven NAND memory production. The new fab will integrate research and manufacturing activities and is designed with a strong sustainability focus. The investment is expected to create thousands of high skill jobs and deepen collaboration with local universities and partners. For investors watching NasdaqGS:MU,...
